creditline: Gift of Mrs C. C. Bovey
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rug, Navajo or Chimayo, made up of two strips seamed up center; design of stripes in rose, yellow, pale green and cream; on the cream stripe geometic motifs with saw tooth outlines in shades of red and coral; narrow fringe at ends; Spanish-American, New Mexican
title: Rug
